## Welcome!

I'm a Research Technician I & PREP Scholar at Case Western Reserve University School of Medicine, focusing on genetics and biomedical research. My research centers on identifying genetic contributors to Alzheimer's disease risk and protection, with particular emphasis on founder (Amish) and diverse (African American) populations.

## Current Research

I'm currently working on a NIH/NIA-funded project investigating genetic risk score distributions for post-partum depression (PPD) and major depressive disorder (MDD) in relation to late-onset Alzheimer's disease.
